name: The International Conference on Life Sciences and Biological Engineering
content: TLSBE 2016 is a international academic conference aims to promote research and developmental activities in Life Science and Biological Engineering field,promote scientific information interchange between researchers, developers, engineers, students, and practitioners working in Japan and abroad, and make an ideal platform for people to share views and experiences in related areas. 1st International Conference on Life Sciences and Biological Engineering (TLSBE 2016) will be held in Fukuoka, Japan, from February 01-03, 2016.
